column7: 2015 at charlton memorial hospital. he was born in fall river a son of the late joseph silvester and the late mary obrien and had lived most of his life in fall river. mr. obrien enjoyed bowling and yardwork. survivors include 2 sisters: katherine bosse
column11: antone silvester all of fall river
column12: several nieces and nephews. private services at the request of the family. south coast cremation service1555 pleasant street fall river
